Academic Writing Workshop - Session Two
We will have the Second Session of our Academic Writing workshop, this afternoon. 
I will be discussing the Logic of Writing, Claims and arguments, and Fallacies.
Please do come and participate in the workshop. 
Please join our GC for more info. Code - t7pf7yni
Venue: C - 02, Old Academic Building.
Time: 2.00 to 3.30 pm.
Regards,
Joseph
